= `static` Class *jplex.xprototype.Logger*  =

== Description ==
Logger class. Is binded with firebug.




== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `error(e)` || `void` || Logs an error inside firebug<br />  - `e <String>` The message<br/>||
|| `log(e)` || `void` || Logs a message inside firebug<br />  - `e <String>` The message<br/>||
|| `warning(e)` || `void` || Logs a warning inside firebug<br />  - `e <String>` The message<br/>||
